references.paper_title: Learning the parts of objects by non-negative matrix factorization
references.reason: This paper introduces Non-negative Matrix Factorization (NMF), a crucial technique used in the FactorizePhys model's attention mechanism.
This foundational paper on the Transformer architecture provides the basis for many attention mechanisms, including the one adapted in this work.

references.paper_title: EfficientPhys: Enabling simple, fast, and accurate camera-based cardiac measurement
references.reason: This paper introduces EfficientPhys, a high-performing baseline 2D-CNN model for rPPG, to which the proposed method's attention module is adapted.

references.paper_title: Robust pulse rate from chrominance-based rPPG
references.reason: This pioneering work on chrominance-based rPPG provides foundational understanding of signal processing and feature extraction techniques in rPPG.

references.paper_title: PhysFormer: Facial video-based physiological measurement with temporal difference transformer
references.reason: PhysFormer is a state-of-the-art transformer-based rPPG model that provides strong comparative performance for the proposed method.
